thread.title: Winemaker Keplinger’s gourmet taste cultivated early in life
thread.title_full: Winemaker Keplinger’s gourmet taste cultivated early in life - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Paige Porter Fischer
title: Winemaker Keplinger’s gourmet taste cultivated early in life
text:
Photo: Sarah Rice, Special To The Chronicle Helen Keplinger at Modern Bakery, one of her favorite spots in Napa. Helen Keplinger at Modern Bakery, one of her favorite spots in Napa.
Helen Keplinger was introduced to the art of tasting — and the discipline of refining her palate — early in life. Helen Keplinger at Modern Bakery, one of her favorite spots in Napa. Helen Keplinger at Modern Bakery, one of her favorite spots in Napa.
Helen Keplinger was introduced to the art of tasting — and the discipline of refining her palate — early in life.
